member.name: Overload:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData.ConvertSchemaStreamToCodeSourceStream
member.summary: Converts a specified schema definition to C# source code proxy, which can then be compiled into a runtime proxy assembly.

member.name: Overload:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData.ConvertTypesToSchemaToFile
member.summary: Converts the specified types to XML schema, and writes it to a file.

member.name: Overload:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData.ConvertTypesToSchemaToStream
member.summary: Converts the specified types to XML schema, and writes it to a stream.
